structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Members of hearing board may administer oaths to witnesses.
law.text: At any hearing the hearing board may require all or any witnesses to be sworn before testifying. Every member of the hearing board may administer oaths in every hearing in which he participates.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 76, effective March 14, 1952.
